comment: I will reply to you ONCE before I mute you. The second we cannot get past skin color to see a good person, then this world is lost. And he is a man who obviously loves his wife and loves the Constitution AND is willing to stand up for what he believes in. It's you I feel sorry for.

                  :ARG0-of (w4 / will-02

                              :purpose (t2 / thing

                                          :ARG0 m3))))))
      :snt4 (f / feel-01
